descriptionlist.description:
Simulate GPS location system-wide

A tool to simulate GPS location system-wide. This tool simulates GPS location natively without any runtime injection (which could implies it works on tweak injection disabled apps), and it's how Apple do it. Run "locsim --help" for more info.

This package tested to be working on iOS 14.3. Might or might not work on lower iOS version.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

changelog.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Added -g, --gpx for gpx file simulations (moving location simulation)
Added -fsglpdr and more flags

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None
